content.text:
# Anandalok Best Actress Award

The Anandalok Puraskar or Anandalok Awards ( ) ceremony is one of the most prominent film events given for Bengali Cinemas in India. The Anandalok, only film magazine in Bengali language, published from Ananda Publishers and Ananda Bazar Patrika presents this Award (Puraskar). The magazine was started on 25 January 1975  and the awards (Puraskar) ceremony was started in 1998.
Following is a list of Best Actress honorees from the ceremony.
